abilities.name: Flashing Head
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that have any Special Energy attached to them.

attacks.name: Rumbling Wires
attacks.effect: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Lighting-GX
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand. Add a card you find there to their Prize cards face down. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
